title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements by collaborating with stakeholders and conducting market research.

title: System Architecture Design (Revised) - Enhancements Proposed
description: This RFC provides an updated design for the overall system architecture of AIHousingMarketPredictor, addressing scalability, fault tolerance, security, data privacy, and regulatory compliance aspects such as GDPR, CCPA, and industry-specific guidelines. The proposed design includes detailed component diagrams, a data architecture plan, and a modular structure for future improvements. Key considerations include a strategy for handling large volumes of data, real-time processing requirements, comprehensive testing, documentation, and machine learning model monitoring and continuous improvement strategies. To further ensure thoroughness, this RFC undergoes a security audit and addresses any potential vulnerabilities. The proposed design requires careful attention to the choice of technologies and tools, as well as the optimization of data flow between components. It is suggested that specific libraries, frameworks, or services be explicitly stated in the design for better understanding and ease of implementation. Lastly, consider integrating monitoring and alerting systems to ensure system health, performance, and potential issues are promptly identified. Please review the updated design and provide feedback or suggestions for improvements. If approved, I recommend assigning this task to a code-architect for further detail refinement.

title: Data Pipeline and ETL
description: Develop a robust data pipeline to collect, clean, and transform housing market data from various sources.

title: Machine Learning Model Development
description: Design, train, and optimize machine learning models for housing market trend prediction.

title: User Interface and Visualization
description: Develop a user-friendly interface for visualizing housing market predictions and insights.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and data privacy laws.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute thorough testing across all components and functionalities.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the application.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation and provide user support channels for the application.
